deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Pausable
 @dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
@return true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.
@dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
@dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
@dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
@dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.details: Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.

pause(address).details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

returns._0: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

unpause(address).details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.title: Pausable
